collection:
Of course, we _do_ (at
least temporarily) store their source code, which may be precious and
sensitive.

When making
short links, we send an encoding of their source code for storage, and again
we must be clear how that process works.
sharing:
When compiling with some Microsoft
compilers we send data to the sister site
[www.godbolt.ms](http://www.godbolt.ms) and that data is covered by
[Microsoft's Privacy Policy](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=521839).
